${modID}:HeadsUpDisplay.NAME: Heads-Up Display
${modID}:HeadsUpDisplay.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies. NL Enemies with Lock-On take 75% more damage from Orbs rather than 50%.

${modID}:Iteration.NAME: Iteration
${modID}:Iteration.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, trigger the passive ability of your next Orb. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Iteration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, trigger the passive ability of your next Orb.

${modID}:HardLightBarrier.NAME: Hard-Light Barrier
${modID}:HardLightBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a 0 cost card, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Cryogenics.NAME: Cryogenics
${modID}:Cryogenics.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Evoke a Frost Orb, draw 1 card.

${modID}:Ping.NAME: Ping
${modID}:Ping.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of all Orbs.

${modID}:Dequeue.NAME: Dequeue
${modID}:Dequeue.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Evoke your leftmost Orb.

${modID}:Malware.NAME: Malware
${modID}:Malware.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Dark. NL Add a Void into your discard pile.

${modID}:EventHorizon.NAME: Event Horizon
${modID}:EventHorizon.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all Dark orbs. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:EventHorizon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs. NL Evoke all Dark orbs. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PowerCell.NAME: Power Cell
${modID}:PowerCell.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Power card, gain [E].
${modID}:PowerCell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw a Power card, gain [E].

${modID}:Firewall.NAME: Firewall
${modID}:Firewall.DESCRIPTION: The first time you draw a Status card each turn, Exhaust it and draw 1 card.
${modID}:Firewall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first two times you draw a Status card each turn, Exhaust it and draw 1 card.

${modID}:TrialAndError.NAME: Trial and Error
${modID}:TrialAndError.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, Upgrade it for the rest of combat.
${modID}:TrialAndError.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card, Upgrade it for the rest of combat.

${modID}:BetaTesting.NAME: Beta Testing
${modID}:BetaTesting.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you Channel an Orb, trigger the passive ability of that Orb twice.
${modID}:BetaTesting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Channel an Orb, trigger the passive ability of that Orb twice.

${modID}:RNG.NAME: RNG
${modID}:RNG.DESCRIPTION: Play the top X cards of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RNG.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the top X+1 cards of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Bide.NAME: Bide
${modID}:Bide.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage.

${modID}:Salvage.NAME: Salvage
${modID}:Salvage.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Stockpile.NAME: Stockpile
${modID}:Stockpile.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Increase the amount drawn by this card by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Ambrosia.NAME: Ambrosia
${modID}:Ambrosia.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Upgrade any cards drawn for the rest of combat.
${modID}:Ambrosia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Upgrade any cards drawn for the rest of combat.

${modID}:Jackpot.NAME: Jackpot
${modID}:Jackpot.DESCRIPTION: Draw X cards. NL Gain !M! [E]. NL Exhaust.
